get.description: Retrieves a list of store categories based on storeId . The response includes category details, and labels based on the authorization status

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit.It is a path variable

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country code of the identified customer location

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state code of the identified customer location

storeId.description: A unique identifier for a store

categoryList.description: A list containing details of SureBright categories

get.description: Retrieves a list of warranty quotes for all price bands based on Category. The response includes price bands details and warranty quotes details.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description:
A Base64-encoded query string used for secure transmission. It includes the storeParentId, country, province, visitId, storeCategoryList, and platform details.

**Example: Original JSON payload before Base64 encoding**
```json
{
  "storeParentId": "13612f29-8ec5-49ad-bab1-5ab09b51367e",
  "country": "US",
  "province": "",
  "visitId": "3d99a4ae-5cf0-4d87-8436-46c0cdc03676",
  "storeCategoryList": [
    {
      "storeCategoryId": "07b1dcb3-fbe5-46c6-b42f-66d82e89f2a7",
      "sbCategoryId": "290f8a04-0464-4140-904b-8fa33df9cbd9",
      "sbProductId": "643bc477-0eec-4da1-946a-38ff7d1292c9",
      "active": true
    }
  ],
  "platform": "POST_PURCHASE"
}
```

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit.It is a path variable

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The platform of the merchant's store

parameters.name: storeParentId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the store parent

parameters.name: storeCategoryList

storeCategoryId.description: Unique identifier for the store category

sbCategoryId.description: Unique identifier for the SureBright category

parameters.description: An array containing store category details used for identifying product categories within a store. Each object represents a category and includes IDs and status.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country code of the identified customer location

parameters.name: visitId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the visitor

parameters.name: province
parameters.description: The province code corresponding to the customer’s location — relevant only for Canada stores.

sbCategoryId.description: Unique identifier for the surebright category

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of warranty quotes for a specific product and its price.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The platform of the merchant's store.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the merchant's store. This is typically the store's domain name (e.g., 'yourstore.myshopify.com' for Shopify stores).

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product that is shown to the customer

parameters.name: variantId
parameters.description: The ID of the variant that is shown to the customer

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country code of the identified customer location

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state code of the identified customer location

warrantyQuoteId.description: A unique ID representing this specific return quote in this particular API call

warrantyQuoteItemList.description: A list of warranty offers generated for this particular request

warrantyProductId.description: Product ID of the warranty item

warrantyVariantId.description: Variant ID of the warranty item

warrantyTenure.description: Duration of the warranty in years

warrantyQuoteItemId.description: Unique identifier for the warranty quote item

tncLink.description: Unique link for legal Terms & Conditions of the warranty for each product Category

sbCategoryId.description: SureBright Category ID of the warranty item

productImageUrl.description: Link of the product image that can be show as part of the warranty offer UI

coverageWidgetHeading.description: Heading for the various tenure options shown to a customer on the product page

coveragePopupHeading.description: Title that nudges the customers to buy a warranty for their product purchase
coveragePopupHeading.example: Don't want to spend extra on this product for the next few years? We've got you covered!

coverageList.description: List of coverage options grouped under different sections

example: Protection against everyday spills (food, beverages, human or pet biological stains, cosmetics, etc).

post.description:
This endpoint is used to create warranty contracts for a specific order.

🛠️ **Contract Creation Logic**
Warranty contracts are created in a 1:1 ratio with the quantity of the associated product purchased.
The warranty quantity is automatically inferred from the product quantity.
Contracts are only created for the exact number of products purchased—warranty coverage cannot exceed or fall short of the product quantity.

🏷️ **Using policySKU**
The `policySKU` is a required field that determines the parameters of each warranty contract, including:
- Coverage Type (e.g., accidental damage, mechanical breakdown)
- Tenure (duration of coverage)
- Country (to apply relevant terms and conditions)
- Category (product type classification)
Merchants must ensure that the appropriate `policySKU` is used for each product to ensure accurate coverage assignment.

🔁 **Handling Updates**
If this endpoint is called for an order where contracts already exist:
- Existing contracts will be updated if the quantity or details have changed.
- Warranty price, tenure, and coverage type are handled automatically based on the provided `policySKU`.

storeId.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit

orderId.description: Unique identifier for the complete successful order placed by a customer on the merchant site. This represents the whole order that can have multiple line items of different quantities.

orderPurchaseDate.description: Date time at which the order was purchased by customer.

orderLineItemList.description: The lineItemList consists of individual line items representing purchased products and/or products with policies. Each line item is uniquely identified by a lineItemId (String: maximum length 48 characters). The planDetails serve to identify the specific quote option acquired by the customer. OptionId is the combination of product attributes separated by #.

policyPurchaseDate.description: Date time at which the policy was purchased by the customer.

policySKU.description: The SKU id of the policy purchased by the customer, this will only be required if warranty to be selected is based on the policy SKU ids shared with the store

policyPrice.description: The price of policy purchased by the customer.

productTitle.example: GreatCircleUSA 3-in-1 Wood Chipper - 7HP Engine, 3 Max Branch Capacity

country.description: Country code for USA is US

storeId.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit

orderId.description: A unique identifier for the complete successful order placed by a customer on the merchant site. This represents the whole order that can have multiple line items of different quantities.

contractList.description: The list of contracts generated for each quantity in each line item. If any error in generating a contract, the error code and msg will be added for that item instead of the contract id.

storeId.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit

orderId.description: A unique identifier for the complete successful order placed by a customer on the merchant site. This represents the whole order that can have multiple line items of different quantities.

contractList.description: The list of contracts generated for each quantity in each line item. If any error in generating a contract, the error code and msg will be added for that item instead of the contract id.

errorList.description: The list of contracts generated for each quantity in each line item. If any error in generating a contract, the error code and msg will be added for that item instead of the contract id.

storeId.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit

orderId.description: A unique identifier for the complete successful order placed by a customer on the merchant site. This represents the whole order that can have multiple line items of different quantities.

errorList.description: The list of contracts generated for each quantity in each line item. If any error in generating a contract, the error code and msg will be added for that item instead of the contract id.

errorMessage.example: Failed to process order with internal service

put.description:
This endpoint is used to create, update, or cancel warranty contracts for a specific order.

🔄 **Updating Line Item Quantities**
If the quantity of a product in the original order is changed (e.g., reduced), the corresponding warranty contract quantity is automatically adjusted to match the updated product quantity.

To reduce or cancel warranty coverage for a line item, update the `quantity` field inside the relevant `lineItem` object in the `orderLineItemList`.

❌ **Cancelling Line Items**
To cancel warranty coverage for a specific line item, set its `quantity` to 0 in the `orderLineItemList`.
Once cancelled, a warranty contract cannot be reactivated.
This applies to both partial cancellations (some items in the order) and full order cancellations.

🧾 **Handling Full Order Cancellation**
For full order cancellations, merchants have two options:
- Remove the `planDetails` object entirely from the request payload.
- Set the `quantity` of each relevant `lineItem` in `orderLineItemList` to 0.

⚙️ **Automatic Price and Tenure Updates**
Any changes to warranty price or tenure (e.g., due to product updates or plan revisions) are handled automatically by the system.

Each line item is uniquely identified by a lineItemId (String: maximum length 48 characters). The planDetails serve to identify the specific quote option acquired by the customer. OptionId is the combination of product attributes separated by #.

post.summary: Create Contracts for Whole System Order
post.description: This endpoint creates warranty contracts for a whole system order. Submit the warranty quote details obtained from the List Quotes for Whole System Warranty endpoint along with the selected warranty plan and line item details. The API returns contract IDs and transaction details for the created warranty contracts.

parameters.name: X-SureBright-Access-Token
parameters.description: Access token for authentication

storeId.description: A unique identifier for the store

warrantyQuoteId.description: The unique identifier for the warranty quote obtained from the List Quotes for Whole System Warranty endpoint

partnerProposalId.description: A unique identifier for the partner's proposal

customerDetails.description: Customer information for the warranty contract

customerAddress2.description: Customer secondary address line (apt, suite, etc.)

warrantyQuoteItemList.description: List of selected warranty quote items with coverage details

coverageYears.description: Duration of the warranty coverage in years

warrantyQuoteItemId.description: Unique identifier for the warranty quote item

lineItemList.description: A list of line items representing the products in the order with coverage status

title.description: The title or name of the product

unitPrice.description: The unit price of the product purchased

isCovered.description: Indicates whether the line item is covered by the warranty

sbCategoryName.description: The SureBright category name for the product

quantity.description: The quantity of the product purchased

description.example: High-performance floorstanding speaker pair for immersive audio systems.

contractIdList.description: List of unique contract IDs created for the warranty

order.description: Order details for the created contract

sourcePlatform.description: The platform source of the order

sbSalesLeadId.description: SureBright sales lead ID associated with the proposal

transactionDate.description: Date and time of the transaction

quoteId.description: Quote ID associated with this item

modelNumber.description: Model number or sales lead ID
